text: Adam Kucz (born 16 June 1971) is a retired Polish football striker.Weltfussball ==References== Category:1971 births Category:Living people Category:Polish footballers Category:Zagłębie Sosnowiec players Category:GKS Katowice players Category:Odra Wodzisław players Category:SV Elversberg players Category:Lech Poznań players Category:ŁKS Łódź players Category:Rozwój Katowice players Category:Kolejarz Stróże players Category:Association football forwards Category:Polish expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Germany Category:Polish expatriate sportspeople in Germany
title: Adam Kucz
